title: Coronavirus: Crew of US aircraft carrier to be quarantined in Guam
description: Earlier this week the USS Theodore Roosevelt's captain pleaded for quarantine to prevent deaths.
content:
Image copyrightGetty ImagesImage caption
 USS Theodore Roosevelt (file photo)
US officials have arranged for sailors from a virus-stricken aircraft carrier to be quarantined in Guam, where the ship has been docked since Friday.
